{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Qualcomm Atheros |model=WCN3660 |revision=module |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/20/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=reference design |type=module |fcc_id=PPD-WCN3660 |ic_id=4104A-WCN3660 |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=APQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Qualcomm Atheros WCN3660 module |wi1_module_if=SD (solder down) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=APQ8064 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=WCN3660 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=0 |lan_ports=0 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |addl_chips= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} This module contains the [[Qualcomm Atheros#Mobile Computing]] WCN3660 :(dual-band single-stream 802.11n/BT 4.0 [BR/EDR+BLE]/FM Rx+Tx) RFIC, :designed to be paired with various ''[[Qualcomm]]'' MSM/APQ host processors. :.. which, per the [http://web.archive.org/web/20140714190958/https://www.bluetooth.org/tpg/RefNotes/SWB-QC30H_Datasheet%20Rev7_TTA.pdf '''Samsung''' SWB-QC30H module datasheet (via archive.org)] :and the press release below, includes, but may not be limited to, the following... *[[Qualcomm]] '''MSM''': 8260A, 8270, 8660A, 8930, 8960, 8974 *[[Qualcomm]] '''APQ''': APQ8030, APQ8060A, APQ8064, APQ8074 ===Additional external links=== *[https://chipworks.secure.force.com/catalog/ProductDetails?sku=QUA-WCN3660 ''WCN3660'' @ '''ChipWorks'''] *[http://www.qualcomm.com/media/releases/2011/05/31/qualcomm-atheros-announces-highly-integrated-connectivity-solution ''Qualcomm Atheros Announces Highly Integrated Connectivity
Solution for Superior Performance in Smartphones and Tablets''
- '''QCA''' press release regarding WCN3660] {{clear}} {{FCC ID entry item NOS |brand=Qualcomm Atheros |model=WCN3660 |revision=module |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/20/2012 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=reference design |fcc_id=PPD-WCN3660 |ic_id=4104A-WCN3660 |wi1_module=Qualcomm Atheros WCN3660 module |wi1_module_if=solder down |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=WCN3660 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |ant_conn= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |txchains=1 |rxchains=1 |sstreams=1 |category=external analog RF module }}
